message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $100 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now. How about $85?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $92.5, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  $90 is the absolute highest I'm willing to go.  Let me know if that works for you.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $95, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. This is my final offer.

Alice, I understand you're close to your minimum, but $95 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go to $91, but that's my final offer.  If you're not willing to go that low, I'm going to have to consider my other options.
I'm not willing to go as low as $91, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $94, but that's as low as I can go. I'm starting to think you're not serious about buying this product.
